product_name: CamelBak Magic Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: The women's CamelBak Magic hydration pack sports a gender-specific design for excellent comfort, plus gear storage and a 70 fl. oz. reservoir for quick mountain biking sessions. Women-specific design includes soft contact points, a narrow mesh shoulder harness and a slider sternum strap; hipbelt is removable. Lightweight XV(TM) back panel offers excellent cross-ventilation to help keep your back cool. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir has its own, front-entry compartment for easy external filling. Quick Link(TM) system lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a Fresh(TM) filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking; valve securely shuts off water flow with an easy, quick turn. Main compartment and front zippered pocket with internal organization store essentials; expandable overflow pocket holds extra gear. Helmet attachment points make it easy to secure your helmet during transport. Side compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying. CamelBak Magic hydration pack has reflective detailing that increases your visibility in low light.
